kpi.name: M8006C18

kpi_info.title: Initial EPS Bearer setup attempts for non-GBR
kpi_info.use: The number of initial EPS bearer setup attempts per non-GBR. Each bearer of the E-RAB to Be Setup List IE is counted. UPDATED: Receipt of a S1AP:Initial Context Setup Request sent by MME to the eNB for each non-GBR bearer contained in the "E-RAB to Be Setup List" IE.

kpi.kpi_alias: Initial EPS Bearer setup attempts for non-GBR
